description: n-th base 10 palindrome that starts with 7.
comments: Subsequence of A002113 (palindromic numbers). Union of A222727 (palindromic primes starting with a digit 7) and A222728 (palindromic composite numbers starting with a digit 7). - Jaroslav Krizek, Mar 12 2013
links: Jaroslav Krizek, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2222
mathematica: palQ[n_Integer, base_Integer] := Module[{idn = IntegerDigits[n, base]}, idn == Reverse[idn]]; Select[Range[0, 100000], IntegerDigits[#][[1]] == 7 && palQ[#, 10] &] (* _T. D. Noe_, Mar 12 2013 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
